introduction.description: Garuda Aerospace pioneers transformative advancements in Precision Agri Tech and Industry 4.0. Established in 2015 with just five members, the company now has over 200 employees, a fleet of 400+ drones, and 500+ pilots operating in 84 cities.

about_us.vision: To make India the drone capital of the world by accelerating industries through cost-effective and strategic drone solutions, combatting climate change with personalized afforestation plans, and fostering business growth for all industries.
about_us.mission: To design cost-effective, human-centric drone solutions that cater to emergencies, promote data-driven growth, and expand drone capabilities to help industries and India flourish.

agnishwar_jayaprakash.title: Founder & CEO
agnishwar_jayaprakash.background: Harvard Business School alumnus, international swimmer, and first-generation entrepreneur from Chennai.
agnishwar_jayaprakash.quote: As a technology enthusiast and a believer in innovation, I believe that drones are the way to go. Drones represent both the present and the future. We are on the path to becoming the first-ever drone unicorn startup in India, aiming to sell 25,000 drones in the next 18 months and export 10,000 drones to 100 countries within 15 months.
key_initiatives: Engaging with government initiatives like Drone Shakti

rithika_mohan.title: Co-Founder & CIO

background.education: Bachelor of Business Administration from Christ University, Bangalore
background.experience: Specialized in D2C, infrastructure, government, and public service sectors; former Director at PC Realty, India.

rithika_mohan.quote: With innovation as our compass and diversity as our strength, we soar towards a future where every aspiring aviator, regardless of gender, finds their wings and reaches for the sky.
